article_text: A new report on the working poor by the United Way has found that half the residents of Miami-Dade County — and 49 percent of the state — are unable to afford basic needs.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Poverty, working poor, study, Miami, Broward, Florida, paycheck, federal poverty level
article_metadata.title: United Way study finds working families struggling to get by | Miami Herald
